mapper.select: select post_content, post_id, file_id, post_section_id, image_type, file_origin_name, file_path, file_name, created_datetime, updated_datetime, file_size from tbl_post_section tps join tbl_post_section_file tpsf on tps.id = tpsf.post_section_id and tps.post_id = #{postId} join tbl_file tf on tpsf.file_id = tf.id
